description: Learn the basics of C programming language, including variables, loops, functions, and memory management. Ideal for beginners in programming.
Explore the fundamental algorithms and algorithmic techniques, focusing on analysis and application. Essential for understanding efficient problem-solving.
Gain an understanding of C++ programming language with a focus on Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA). Covers classes, objects, and STL usage.
Learn about essential data structures such as arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues. Understand their implementation and usage in various algorithms.
Discover object-oriented programming (OOP) concepts using Python. Covers classes, inheritance, polymorphism, and more for efficient coding.
Delve into the principles and practices of software engineering, including requirements gathering, design patterns, testing, and project management.
Learn the fundamentals of AWS (Amazon Web Services) and cloud computing. Covers services, deployment, and best practices for scalable applications.
Understand MySQL database management system, including database design, querying, and administration. Suitable for aspiring database administrators.
Develop problem-solving skills through algorithmic thinking and practice. Focuses on logical reasoning and effective strategies for coding challenges.
